main event: Multiple sightings of disk-like objects over Portland, Oregon on 4th July 1947 by law enforcement, airline crew, and civilians.
interesting points: Disk-like objects seen by law enforcement officers, members of an airline crew, and civilians.
Objects observed to be traveling at great heights and speeds, changing direction erratically with no engine noises.
A coast guardsman near Seattle reported photographing a 'white saucer' flying over Lake Washington.
Reports of objects resembling metallic disks glinting in the sunlight and appearing against the sunset.
Investigation by the Fourth Air Force resulted in the forwarding of multiple UFO reports to the Army Air Forces in Washington, D.C.
witnesses: law enforcement, airline crew, civilians, coast guardsman
